mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.cBranch_C cBranch_C, concat('[',cBranch_C,']',b.cBranch_N) cBranch_N, b.cSettleMan cSettleMan, concat('pay_',p.cPay_C) cPay_C, p.cPay_C readPayCode, p.cPay_N cPay_N, SUM(p.nPayAmt) nPayAmt FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill b LEFT JOIN ${com}.d_t_bill_pay p ON b.cBill_C = p.cBill_C WHERE ${query} AND (DBUSINESS >= #{startDate} OR #{startDate} IS NULL) AND (DBUSINESS <= #{endDate} OR #{endDate} IS NULL) AND p.CPAY_C IS NOT NULL GROUP BY b.cBranch_C , b.cBranch_N , b.cSettleMan, p.cPay_C, p.cPay_N UNION ALL SELECT b.cBranch_C cBranch_C, concat('[',cBranch_C,']',b.cBranch_N) cBranch_N, b.cSettleMan cSettleMan, 'pay_sum' cPay_C, '' readPayCode, '合计' cPay_N , SUM(p.nPayAmt) nPayAmt FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill b LEFT JOIN ${com}.d_t_bill_pay p ON b.cBill_C = p.cBill_C WHERE ${query} AND (DBUSINESS >= #{startDate} OR #{startDate} IS NULL) AND (DBUSINESS <= #{endDate} OR #{endDate} IS NULL) AND p.CPAY_C IS NOT NULL GROUP BY b.cBranch_C , b.cBranch_N , b.CSETTLEMAN ) a ORDER BY cBranch_C, CSETTLEMAN, CPAY_C

SELECT concat('pay_',p.cPay_C) cPay_C, p.cPay_N cPay_N FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill b LEFT JOIN ${com}.d_t_bill_pay p ON b.cBill_C = p.cBill_C WHERE ${query} AND (DBUSINESS >= #{startDate} OR #{startDate} IS NULL) AND (DBUSINESS <= #{endDate} OR #{endDate} IS NULL) AND p.CPAY_C IS NOT NULL GROUP BY p.cPay_C, p.cPay_N ORDER BY p.CPAY_C
